data.actual_result: The text with the amount of remaining slots is black colored
data.expected_result: The text with the amount of remaining slots should be white colored
data.short_description: The amount of remaining group members has wrong color (black) in invitation embed
data.steps_to_repro: - Start any game that supports Discord invitation through the chat (I used my own rich presence, you can see my code in the attachments) (your max party size has to be at least 7) - Press "+" button - Click on the "Invite to play something" - Observe (screenshots attached)
